column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou Malnati's is one of a handful of really good Chicago pizzeria's. "The Lou" (perhaps not the best name if you're used to British English
column2: but okay...) is a classic Chicago deep dish spinach pizza
column3: and it's wonderful. The beer list was also quite presentable. We had an Antihero IPA
column4: which was a perfect accompaniment to the pizza. They advertise the large as for four people
column6: with three of us working on it
column7: they weren't kidding. Service was great
column8: and the ambiance is classic old-school Chicago pizza. This was our first visit to this particular location
column9: but it more than lives up to the brand's well-deserved reputation.
